name: Guardian Angel (romeosdaydream)
description:
Play as a human's guardian angel! Or... hmm, that's not right. Play as an eldritch horror that has taken interest in a certain human. Tell them to sleep, eat, read, all that good stuff. Why don't you mess with them a little while you're at it too?

Keep your human alive and there are 3 possible endings. Do your best!

All you need is a mouse.
